snippet: The State Legislature should permit New York City to enforce its speed limits and traffic rules.
abstract: Editorial calls on New York State legislature to allow New York City to install many more street cameras in order to enforce its speed limits and traffic rule, saving lives in process.
lead_paragraph: The State Legislature should permit New York City to enforce its speed limits and traffic rules.

headline.seo: More Cameras for New York City Streets
headline.main: More Cameras for New York City Streets
headline.print_headline: More Cameras for New York City Streets
